name: Mario Kart Demo (Source Code & Tutorials) by Unity 3D
name_original: Mario Kart Demo (Source Code & Tutorials) by Unity 3D
description:
Watch the tutorial: 

How to make Mario Kart - Controller Part

Game Control:  

Space bar to speed up. 

V to drift.

S to go backwards.

Arrows for directions.

Free tutorial PDF:

The tutorial PDF is free to download.

Tutorials and insights of Mario Kart Unity project.pdf is in the download section.

DISCLAIMER:

Made for educational purpose only. Source code cannot be used for commercial games.
